dialogueLines.line: ? What's the matter with you? Your brains are falling out of your head.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Hey man! Do you know me or something?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: ...What are you talking about all of a sudden?
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Of course I don't know you, you stupid zombie. I'm not the type to memorize other people's faces.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Actually, I lost my memory of when I was alive... I've been going around the city eating people. Right now, I'm also doing rap battles.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: But I see...you don't know me. I guess I'll just have to win the rap battle and have my wish come true.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: ...Oh! You have a microphone! That means you're a participant in the rap battle!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Okay, man! You have to rap with me!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Huh!? Why would I have a rap battle with a cannibalistic zombie like you...
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Hey, zombie. If you do me one favor after you sing, I'll give you a battle.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad
